TextView.android:text: Services that are rendered to children who are sick and manage under integrated Management of Childhood Illnesses
1. INDIVIDUAL Treatment Record (ITR)with family number (1 original copy)
1. In the barangay health station or health center
1. Give the mother and Baby booklet/Referral slip at Receiving Section

1.1. Review the Individual Treatment Record/Mother and Baby Booklet

1.2. Record at the Clients logbook

1.3. Vital signs taking and recording Temperature Weighing Respiratory rate and other anthropometric Measurements

1.4. Give the immediate care right after the birth and record

2.1. Assist the patient according to IMCI manual

2.2. Classify the patient according to IMCI manual

2.3. Manage and xx the patient according to IMCI classification manual

2.4. Give counseling and home care instruction

2.5. Follow-up 3 days after

2.6. Refer to hospital, if necessary

2.7. Referral form issued
3. Procced to Pharmacy for Drug Dispensing

3.1. Dispense prescribed medicines

3.2. Explain the potency being prescribed 

3.3. Let the patient sign the medicines received at the dispensing logbook
4. Accomplished the Client Satisfaction Measurement/Client Satisfaction Survey (CSM/CSS)
4.1. Request the client to accomplished the Client Satisfaction Measurement/ Client Satisfaction Survey (CSM/CSS)\n\n4.2. Instruct the client to drop the Accomplished Forms in the designated drop box

All babies in the first 90 minutes of their life must be given a care under unangyakap protocol (Facility Based delivery) and screened in any metabolic disorders through the so called New born Screening.
2. 1 Original Copy with the previous history of treatment
In the barangay health station or health center
5. 1 Original Copy of the booklet Early Childhood Care and development
1. AT Receiving Section\n\n- Present the Early Childhood Care and Development card/Individual Treatment Record/Mother and baby booklet

1.1. Review the Individual Treatment Record/Mother and Baby Booklet

1.2. Record at the Clients Logbook

1.3. Vital signs taking and recording Temperature Weighing Respiratory rate
2. Pay the required fees at the Municipal Treasury Office for newborn screening
2.1. Instruct clients to pay at MTO
3.1. Give immunization by antigen and record
4. Go to PHN trained on New Born Screening
5.1. Give counseling and home care instructions
6. Accomplished the Client Satisfaction Measurement/Client Satisfaction Survey (CSM/CSS)
6.1. Request the client to accomplished the Client Satisfaction Measurement/Client Satisfaction Survey (CSM/CSS)\n\n6.2. Instruct the client to drop the Accomplished Forms in the designated drop box
